channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Illegal camping on Winns Common, 17th November
item.description:
Reports of illegal camping with tent on Winns Common just up from Tewson Road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Philimore Close, Plumstead

item.title: Litter area of Adley and Meeson Street, 17th November
item.description:
I reported litter in area of Adley & Meeson St and received update that ‘issue was resolved’ - but same litter is still on Meeson St - see photos taken today showing same litter as was in photos sent last week. Be grateful for street clean

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adley Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street sign post knocked flat posing trip hazard, 17th November
item.description:
Street sign post folded over flat with pavement. Trip hazard. Outside 195 Kidbrooje Park Road. Suspect HGV delivering building goods has reversed into it.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kidbrooke Park Road, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lid broken next to bus stop N outside landmark hotel Marylebon Road, 17th November
item.description:
Lid of poll need to fix it next to bus stop N outside landmark Hotel Marylebone road as wire comes out causing nuisance and safety hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melcombe Place, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Graffiti on side of pub, 17th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68-70, Page's Walk, Old Kent Road, London Borough of Southwark

item.title: "Brands At Work" dumped an electrical/water device, 17th November
item.description:
"Brands At Work" dumped an electrical/water device. The office opposite is who dumped it; you can see the sign. A man walked out, emptied water into the street then dumped it across the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 144-152, Bermondsey Street, Old Kent Road, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed box fly tipped, 17th November
item.description:
Previously reported along with dog poo bags and it said resolved however only the poo bags have been removed. The bed is still there. Also a baby buggy fly tipped a few metres away at the corner of Honor Oak Rise and Forest Hill Road, beside the grit bin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Forest Hill Road, Nunhead, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Strutton Ground, Millbank, City of Westminster

item.title: Communal bins not emptied, 17th November
item.description:
Communal bins at Mill Lane not emptied for about 6-8 weeks, maybe longer (blue top and black top). Communal bins at Gunner Lane (blue top recycling) not emptied for approx. 2 weeks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mill Lane, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Domestic Waste and General Rubbish, 17th November
item.description:
Repeated refuse dumped outside our building. Please clear & investigate to see who keeps leaving domestic waste here. It's attracting pests and it's disgusting. Maybe a fine will deter? There are also numerous cans and other rubbish that needs clearing.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Scawfell Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Christmas tree request maintenance, 17th November
item.description:
I’m writing to let you know that the community Christmas tree currently looks rather poor and could use some attention before the festive season. It would be wonderful if maintenance or replacement could be refreshed to help it look more festive in time for Christmas. Thank you for your help and for keeping penge looking cheerful.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Penge Lane, Penge, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, 17th November
item.description:
Lots of rubbish on green in woodbank rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodbank Road, Downham, Lee, London Borough of Lewisham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple bags of leaves, 17th November
item.description:
The community work people cleared all the leaves on the roadway in Danson Park South off Lakeside Close . They have bagged them all up but now there are multiple (thirty?) blue bags of leaves.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lakeside Close, Blendon, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet
